title: Plate, "Lenin Reading Pravda", 1960–70
markings: Marks: On underside: Dulevo mark (falcon) stamped in blue overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Circular, with image of Lenin sitting at desk reading copy of "Pravda" newspaper; thin gilded band at edge

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, "Lenin Reading Pravda", 1960–70.
1960–70. porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-42.
